text: GM closed down $ 1.875 at $ 44.875 in New York Stock Exchange trading yesterday . Earnings for GM common stock , reflecting the performance of GM 's core automotive operations , will be disclosed this morning . GM Class H , which represents a dividend interest in Hughes earnings , closed at $ 29 , up 25 cents in Big Board composite trading . GM Class E , which represents a dividend interest in EDS profit , fell 75 cents to $ 52.25 on the Big Board .
